addr: 5300 East Olympic Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90022
title: Winter Benefit Dinner
desc: Join the Los Angeles Music and Art School (LAMusArt) and the Young Professionals Advisory Board (YPAB) at the 2015 Winter Benefit Dinner. We invite you to partner with LAMusArt to continue the prevalence of arts education in the daily lives of our community?s youth and to provide them with a path to successful higher education and career opportunities. The Winter Benefit Dinner will be held on Saturday, December 5, 2015 at 6:30 p.m. at the famous Tamayo Restaurant. ?It will feature a performance by the new reinstated LAMusArt choir and student vocalists.? Following dinner, mingle while you enjoy ornament-making, participate in creating a collaborative art piece, and get silly at the photo station! Your support and investment is instrumental for the continuing success of our students and programs. Proceeds from the event will sustain LAMusArt?s Student Scholarship Fund, which will provide current and future choir students with quality access to arts education programs. Come join us for a night of great music, food, fun, and holiday cheer all for a great cause! For information on  sponsorship opportunities  please contact Manuel Prieto at mprieto@lamusart.org? ? ? ? ? ? To learn more about LAMusArt please visit:  www.lamusart.org  |  facebook.com/LAMusArt  | @LAMusArt on Twitter and Instagram
